## Section

### Prerequisites

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(wbstats)
```

```{r}
region_gdp_df <- wb_data(
  "NY.GDP.MKTP.CD",
        start_date = 2021,
        end_date = 2021,
        return_wide = F
) |> 
  transmute(
    country,
            region = countrycode::countrycode(iso3c, "iso3c", "region"),
            gdp = value
  )

region_gdp_df
```

```{r}
ggplot(region_gdp_df, aes(x = gdp, y = region, fill = region)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
